long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
=== Index Screen ===

H - Move Previous page
L - Move Next page
K - Move Up
J - Move Down
. - Move Top
SHIFT+G - Move Bottom
R - Refresh
O - Open in new window
P - Share to Google+
T - Tweet

=== Node Screen ===

K - Move Up
J - Move Down
. - Move Top
SHIFT+G - Move Bottom
R - Reply
P - Share to Google+
T - Tweet
